metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14863 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
There is a vulnerability in all angular versions before 1.5.0-beta.0, where after escaping the context of the web application, the web application delivers data to its users along with other trusted dynamic content, without validating it.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-14863` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-angularjs - 1.5.10-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: angular.js package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.10-1').
